canvas.title: Dutch Tax Authority – CANVAS Form Editor
canvas.description: As lead developer on this project for the Dutch Tax Authority, he built a future-proof low-code platform that enables editors to independently design and manage complex forms. Through smart configuration, multilingual support, and a visual interface, time-to-market was drastically reduced and developer dependency minimized. For a government organization, this means direct cost savings and a boost in quality.

postcodeloterij.title: Nationale Postcode Loterij – Design System
postcodeloterij.description: In just six months, he developed a scalable design system for multiple marketing brands within a single architecture. By applying theming and reusable components, campaigns such as 'Geniet van het Goede' and 'VIP-kaarten Vriendenloterij' were rolled out quickly with minimal overhead. This resulted not only in visual consistency, but also in faster go-lives and higher conversion rates.

athlon.title: Athlon – Migration & Rebuild
athlon.description: For Athlon, he led the complete rebuild of an Angular 1.6 application into a modern architecture based on RxJS and configuration-driven components. The result: a scalable, WCAG-compliant frontend that enables the business to manage dynamic forms independently. The new stack reduces maintenance costs, speeds up development, and meets the highest accessibility standards.
